categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository focusing on fixes, improvements, and new features:

1. Migration fixes (PR #3888) by wtfsayo addressed issues with the v2 migrations system.

2. A significant feature addition (PR #3894) by mindxploit introduced permanent knowledge capability to the system.

3. A new cleaning command for v2 (PR #3891) was implemented by wtfsayo.

4. GUI build and API server fixes (PR #3893) were contributed by wtfsayo to resolve existing issues.

5. Docker file updates (PR #3887) were provided by HashWarlock.

6. A simple typo fix in the core package (PR #3903) was submitted by RiverZ-pingu.

7. Client WebSocket Secure (WSS) functionality (PR #3902) was added by tcm390.

8. Local autodoc feature for v2 (PR #3905) was contributed by jmikedupont2.

9. Core type declaration fixes were addressed in two separate PRs by wtfsayo: one fixing core DTS generation (PR #3898) and another specifically addressing core type declarations (PR #3895).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests were recently merged into the elizaOS/eliza repository addressing various issues and adding new features:

1. Bug fixes were implemented for the GUI build and API server in PR #3893.

2. A new 'clean' command was added to the core functionality in PR #3892, which also reverted some minor changes.

3. The clean command was refactored in PR #3891, creating a V2 version.

4. PR #3889 modified the system to skip migrations if they already exist, working under the assumption that only one migration is maintained.

5. Migration-related bugs were fixed in PR #3888 (v2-fix-migrations).

6. Core DTS (Device Tree Source) generation was fixed in PR #3898.

categories.title: Recent GitHub Issues in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Three recent issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Issue #3896: A user reported that microphone functionality and audio playback are not working properly in the client application.

2. Issue #3897: There's a suggestion that line breaks should be converted to spaces in the application.

3. Issue #3904: A user has suggested improving the documentation's sitemap.xml priority to enhance SEO and discoverability.

Over the past two days (March 11-13, 2025), the elizaos/eliza repository has shown consistent development activity. The project had a total of 14 new pull requests, with 6 of them successfully merged. Additionally, 4 new issues were created during this period. The project maintained an active contributor base, with 7 contributors on March 11-12 and 8 contributors on March 12-13, showing a slight increase in developer participation.
sources: From 2025-03-11 to 2025-03-12, elizaos/eliza had 9 new PRs (5 merged), 2 new issues, and 7 active contributors.
From 2025-03-12 to 2025-03-13, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (1 merged), 2 new issues, and 8 active contributors.
